item.title: GitLab
item.description: GitLabyum安装sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-service=http sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-service=https sudo systemctl reload firewalld sudo yum install postfix sudo systemctl enable postfix sudo systemctl start postfix curl https://packages.gitlab.com/install/repositories/gitlab/gitlab-ce/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash yum install gitlab-ce #/etc/gitlab/gitlab.rb #external_url "http://10.0.0.1" gitlab-ctl reconfigure systemctl enable gitlab-runsvdir.service apt安装config[root
